messages.title: A Vote for Anyone Other Than the Conservatives and We’ll Get Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister
messages.content: At the end of this election, we’ll either get a Conservative majority or a hung parliament. Corbyn would be propped up by parties like the Scottish Nationalists. And they’re demanding another referendum to break up Britain. Labour spent the last three years blocking Brexit. Now they want a second referendum. Without your vote, we’ll get another hung parliament. And that means years of more confusion.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Secure the majority government our country needs so we can get Brexit done and focus on the NHS, police and schools.
SNP to back Labour government only with Scottish independence vote.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Secure the majority government our country needs so we can get Brexit done and focus on the NHS, police and schools.

issues.brexitEurope: Labour spent the last three years blocking Brexit. Now they want a second referendum. He wants to block your Brexit vote.
issues.government: At the end of this election, we’ll either get a Conservative majority or a hung parliament.

community.content: Your vote can be the difference at this election.
